dialogue: The trip is short, but the planet is surrounded by an asteroid field.
Very soon on the trip, Spirit sees clumps of asteroids.
Already? Well, alright then. Guess I'll just have to sneak by...
Spirit narrowly avoids several stray asteroids
before she's suddenly surrounded by another cluster.
This cycle continues for the rest of the trip.
Eventualy, Spirit makes it through and lands on
the planet, vehicle and goods completely intact.
Finally, time to get this shady job over with.
